## AuthorizeOptions interface

Auth UI authorization options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface AuthorizeOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [loginHint](./node-client.authorizeoptions.loginhint.md) | <code>string</code> | OIDC login hint parameter |
|  [prompt](./node-client.authorizeoptions.prompt.md) | <code>string</code> | OIDC prompt parameter. |
|  [redirectURI](./node-client.authorizeoptions.redirecturi.md) | <code>string</code> | Redirect uri. Redirection URI to which the response will be sent after authorization. |
|  [state](./node-client.authorizeoptions.state.md) | <code>string</code> | OAuth 2.0 state value. |
|  [uiLocales](./node-client.authorizeoptions.uilocales.md) | <code>string[]</code> | UI locale tags |
